Name: Solo War Medieval
About the game: Solo War Medieval is a first-person shooter game like no other. You need to survive against infinite amount of knights alone, but modern weapons would help you a bit. Modern weapons vs. medieval knights - what would be outcome? Test it yourself and have some fun while those medieval knights try to get you! Solo War Medieval is a game about surviving solo against medieval knights with modern weapons. It maybe sounds unfair but if you encounter infinite amount of knights it's likely that on some point they will get you. Make one mistake and you'll die. There are lots of different weapons which you can choose to fit best for you.
